statements: SELECT * FROM market_prices_of_agricultural_products;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM market_prices_of_agricultural_products ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM market_prices_of_agricultural_products WHERE price > 10;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM market_prices_of_agricultural_products WHERE quantity < 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT AVG(price) AS average_price FROM market_prices_of_agricultural_products;
SELECT * FROM market_prices_of_agricultural_products ORDER BY price DESC, quantity ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, price FROM market_prices_of_agricultural_products WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price, quantity FROM market_prices_of_agricultural_products WHERE price BETWEEN 10.00 AND 20.00;
SELECT * FROM market_prices_of_agricultural_products ORDER BY quantity DESC, price ASC LIMIT 5 OFFSET 2;
SELECT product_name, AVG(price) AS average_price FROM market_prices_of_agricultural_products GROUP BY product_name HAVING AVG(price) > 15.00 ORDER BY average_price DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM market_prices  WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_name, price FROM market_prices WHERE product_id = 3;
SELECT AVG(price) AS average_price FROM market_prices;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price, date FROM market_prices ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price, date FROM market_prices WHERE date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM market_prices WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM market_prices INNER JOIN pricing_strategies ON market_prices.product_id = pricing_strategies.strategy_id WHERE product_id = 1 AND start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT product_id, product_name, price, date FROM market_prices WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM pricing_strategies WHERE target_market = 'Europe' OR target_market = 'Asia' ORDER BY strategy_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT SUM(price) AS total_price FROM market_prices WHERE date >= '2022-08-01'
SELECT * FROM agricultural_products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM agricultural_products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_category FROM agricultural_products ORDER BY product_category ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM agricultural_products WHERE price < 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM market_prices WHERE market_location='New York' AND market_date='2022-01-15';
SELECT product_name, product_category, price FROM agricultural_products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT market_location, market_date, price FROM market_prices WHERE market_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT strategy_name, min_price, max_price FROM pricing_strategies WHERE min_price < 100 AND max_price > 200 ORDER BY max_price DESC, min_price ASC;

SELECT product_name, market_location, market_date, price FROM agricultural_products JOIN market_prices ON agricultural_products.product_id = market_prices.product_id WHERE price < 100 ORDER BY market_location, product_name;

SELECT product_name, product_category, s.strategy_name, s.min_price, s.max_price FROM pricing_strategies s JOIN agricultural_products p ON s.product_id = p.product_id WHERE s.min_price <> s.max_price ORDER BY product_category ASC, max_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE quantity BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE quantity > 5 AND revenue > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products JOIN prices ON products.product_id = prices.product_id WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM prices WHERE effective_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-31';
SELECT * FROM AgriculturalProducts;
SELECT product_name, price FROM AgriculturalProducts WHERE price > 50;
SELECT category, quantity FROM AgriculturalProducts ORDER BY category ASC;
SELECT market_location, demand_level, price_sensitivity FROM MarketAnalysis WHERE demand_level < 3;
SELECT competitor_name, price, popularity_level FROM CompetitorPrices ORDER BY price DESC, popularity_level ASC;
SELECT * FROM AgriculturalProducts;
SELECT product_name, price FROM AgriculturalProducts WHERE category = 'Fruits';
SELECT product_id, category, price FROM AgriculturalProducts ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT market_location, demand_level FROM MarketAnalysis WHERE price_sensitivity > 3 ORDER BY demand_level DESC;
SELECT competitor_name, price, popularity_level FROM CompetitorPrices WHERE price < 50 AND popularity_level > 3 ORDER BY price ASC
